definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
Epistle of St Paul to the Ephesians

sentences.chinese: 12我已經打發推基古往以弗所去。

sentences.english: 17From Miletus, Paul sent to Ephesus for the elders of the church.
sentences.chinese: 保羅從米利都打發人往以弗所去，請教會的長老來。

sentences.english: The writer to Ephesians condemns that kind of language.
sentences.chinese: 《以弗所書》的作者譴責這種語言。

sentences.english: There seems to have been some very faithful servants of Christ in the Ephesian church.
sentences.chinese: 特別是在以弗所的教會，更有很多忠心事主的信徒。

sentences.english: Paul had assigned Timothy to carry out special duties at the church in Ephesus.
sentences.chinese: 保羅曾委派提摩太在以弗所教會中承擔特別的事工。

sentences.english: It is found in Ephesians, Chapter 1, verse 11.
sentences.chinese: 是在以弗所書第一章，11節。

sentences.english: Wives are told in Ephesians 5:22 to submit to their husbands as to the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 以弗所書5:22節說妻子當順服丈夫，如同順服主。

sentences.english: And Tychicus I have sent to Ephesus.
sentences.chinese: 我已經打發推基古往以弗所去。

sentences.english: He is said to have died in Ephesus, and his tomb became a site of pilgrimage.
sentences.chinese: 據說他死後葬在以弗所，他的墓地成爲朝聖地。

sentences.english: The Emperor supported the synod, but the Pope repudiated it.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝支持以弗所宗教會議，但教皇卻拒絕承認它。

sentences.english: You know very well in how many ways he helped me in Ephesus.
sentences.chinese: 他在以弗所怎樣多多地服事我，是你明明知道的。

sentences.english: The relationship between the Epistle to the Ephesians and I Peter is much closer.
sentences.chinese: 之間的關係，書信的以弗所和彼得更接近。

sentences.english: One of pseudo-Paul's letters may have been addressed to Ephesus.
sentences.chinese: 有一封冒保羅之名所寫的書信是寫給以弗所的。

sentences.english: Do you remember the message in Ephesus that Paul gave to Timothy and the church?
sentences.chinese: 你記得在以弗所書中保羅給提摩太和教會的信息嗎？

sentences.english: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.
sentences.chinese: 我已經打發推基古往以弗所去。

sentences.english: Act 20:17 From Miletus he sent messengers to Ephesus to ask the elders of the church to meet with him.
sentences.chinese: 保羅從米利都打發人往以弗所去，請教會的長老來。
